name: Learn Object Oriented Programming
description:
This is an educational application for learning object-oriented-programming.  It was created as my final project at Slovak Technical University.

It is for everyone, who is learning OOP and needs to see so many different concepts in another perspective. It is also beneficial for those, who already know about OOP, but want to deepen their knowledge.

If you have any feedback, please contact me on:
jahic.jakub@gmail.com
